})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-02 12:37:56</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>dae2500097f8421053f8b5a6f053af33</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create Account on Salesforce</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="TO-DO Application" source="x_1129749_to_do_0">59e1a10597a0021053f8b5a6f053af30</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="TO-DO Application">59e1a10597a0021053f8b5a6f053af30</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_dae2500097f8421053f8b5a6f053af33</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-04 06:01:01</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=dae2500097f8421053f8b5a6f053af33"/></record_update>
